name: Universum 2
description:
Currently v0.01

Universum 2 is a full re-build on the first and will be much more like a polished game then a contest entry like the original, plus containing the gameplay elements of the current Android version.

Universum is an endless bullet hell, as long as you can fight the enemy, they will keep on coming and get progressively harder along the way.

There are currently a few different types of enemies but there are more to come.

Choose from loads of different Unlockable ships to play as, each with their own unique styles.

Upgrade your ship to fight harder and longer, get power-ups to help you increase your score.

Unlock built in achievements (coming soon)

Increase your stats as you level up.

Import your own ships (coming soon)

Here is the current list of features and changes;

-Endless gameplay

-Gameplay upgrades

-Better collision systems

-Level Stats

-Leveling system

-Unlockable changes

-Unlockable skins

-Unlock code input

-Graphics upgrade

-Better GUI

-Faster loading times

-Better gold system

-Plus more...

(there is a lot of things still left to add and change, menu screens are temp and will be changed)

This is very early access.
